p: Epidemics of DENV and ZIKV have been recent occurrences in Brazil and they are considered to be the most important flaviviruses circulating in this country [ 4, 34]. Consequently, laboratory diagnosis during epidemic periods is directed at detection of these viruses. This hinders the detection of other circulating flaviviruses, including SLEV, which may silently becoming widely dispersed in the Americas [ 4, 33â€“ 36]. Therefore, our results indicate the need for a wider spectrum of active surveillance of arboviruses during outbreaks of dengue [ 4, 34].
